title: AnonBitCoiner
author: AnonBitCoiner
content: Website: https://getintopc.com/Amount Hacked: 1k$Type of Hacking: keyboard, Wallet access, Gmail, twitter and all other data accessToday i am sharing my personal experience from one of the biggest scam site which offer free Software Crack and registration key. If you need any kind of paid software for free then you will find this only in Getintopc. All other websites appears in google search will not give you real key or crack. you will download files more than 300 mb and it will give error but Gentintopc provide 100% real software. This is the biggest reason when you search any free Software, you will find Getintopc on the topIf you install these softwares and cracked, it will change your registry and at first your keyboard will be hacked. whenever you make any transactions, it will show same address that you input but you will realize it change from original one when Metamask approved prompt appear Its not end here but these softwares contain malicious virus which will completely reveal your data to hacker. Hacker will have full access to your Gmails, telegram, twitter etc. in short your full system will be hacked. How i discover it?unfortunately i have been hacked two times and lost 1k$. i used this website for free screen recording and video editing software like premier pro. one day suddenly All Ethereum,bnb has been sent from all my Wallets to unknown address at one time. I think use bot to send only these main tokens. i lost 400$ first time but fortunately my 2500$ token remain safe and i withdrawn immediately after i realize. This was first time. I didn't know at the time how it happened and again was using Laptop and same free softwares. After 3 months again my all wallets hacked because i have saved all phrases in my personal Gmail (Damn). Hacker deleted all phrases from draft. This time my telegram, twitter also compromised. I thought it was caused by the mobile so I changed the mobile. after some days same situation happened with my cousin and he was also using free Software from Getintopc. after that my 3 friend and 2 more cousin faced same situation and now u can say 100% sure that Getintopc owner is big scammer but I don't know how we can report it .The purpose of telling here was that all people should be aware of it and no one should download any software from it. If you  need to download any software, then you should choose such a laptop for that which is extra and have no personal data, account information.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: or just stay away from anything craked/pirated... it's one of the most common ways to infest your device with malwares. Storing your seed online unprotected also make the work easier for hacker/s. Look into offline storage and make more than two copies e.g. paper, steel plates, washers etc.This is a good time to go over your cybersecurity, this could help: https://github.com/Lissy93/personal-security-checklist

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: I am sorry to hear about your loss but you made a lot of mistakes, from saving your seed phrase in gmail, to downloading dodgy cracked software on your computer that you use for crypto. Beside fixing those issues, you should also consider getting hardware wallet because in case of your computer getting compromised, attacker still wouldn't be able to access your crypto (given that you properly secure HW seed phrase and save it offline).Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMAll other websites appears in google search will not give you real key or crack. you will download files more than 300 mb and it will give error but Gentintopc provide 100% real software. This is the biggest reason when you search any free Software, you will find Getintopc on the topYou used this website in the past and everything was OK, and now suddenly they tuned out to be scammers?Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM I thought it was caused by the mobile so I changed the mobile. after some days same situation happened with my cousin and he was also using free Software from Getintopc. after that my 3 friend and 2 more cousin faced same situation and now u can say 100% sure that Getintopc owner is big scammer but I don't know how we can report it .Did you all download the same program, or different ones? Because if you all downloaded the same program, maybe it wasn't the website fault (which I never heard of by the way).

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: It seems this website has many followers and users of their software checking some of the posts of their software there are many comments about the use of their software, with this thread they will be warned, my concern is that Gmail do you use a phone authentication to restrict access and what kind of anti-virus you're using I remember downloading from one software pirated site and my two anti viruses stop this software from running even if I included it in my exclusion software option.I hope you can come back here and add more information and address our concern this is for reference for users of similar sites like getintopc.com.I'm surprised to see that Virustotal gave it 100% clean results https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/5ef5c8a52f9c934ee1f6a76ce9e97b1208cc350efeb5bbaa50b32d841165fc01

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on February 27, 2023, 08:04:44 AMor just stay away from anything craked/pirated... Some free lancers or other users needed want these softwares for free and doesn't want to pay 100$ yearly for full version. Without key you cannot get full access to required software. for example in the free screen recorder watermark will not removed. Most of the free lancers and some bounty hunters also using these free screen recorder.Quote from: Rikafip on February 27, 2023, 08:10:53 AMI am sorry to hear about your loss but you made a lot of mistakes, from saving your seed phrase in gmail, to downloading dodgy cracked software on your computer that you use for crypto. Beside fixing those issues, you should also consider getting hardware wallet because in case of your computer getting compromised, attacker still wouldn't be able to access your crypto (given that you properly secure HW seed phrase and save it offline). Yes it happens six months ago and then Those one thousand usdt taught me many secure option like hardware wallet, use paid anti malware, not use of cloud storage for personal information. I want other people to be safe from it. Quote from: Rikafip on February 27, 2023, 08:10:53 AMYou used this website in the past and everything was OK, and now suddenly they tuned out to be scammers? No, as far as we talk about providing software files and crack files then this website is on top because its providing real Software+ cracks but its contain also malware which is big issue Quote from: Rikafip on February 27, 2023, 08:10:53 AMDid you all download the same program, or different ones? Because if you all downloaded the same program, maybe it wasn't the website fault (which I never heard of by the way).No, i downloaded different programs to check this cincern and find that almost 90% software contains these hacking malwares. i saw some bounty hunters messages in telegram chat which has same issue and reason is only downloading software Form this website.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM-snip- After 3 months again my all wallets hacked because i have saved all phrases in my personal Gmail (Damn). Hacker deleted all phrases from draft. This time my telegram, twitter also compromised. I thought it was caused by the mobile so I changed the mobile. Sorry for your loss.You should understand that storing private keys online is not recommended at all. Also, I think it's time you consider HW wallet, if you see you are actively using cracked/pirated softwares.Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM-snip-but I don't know how we can report it .Report the site to the registrar, but this won't be enough to stop the scam attempt as the scammer will have a backup of the malicious files and will just have to register a new domain.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: I've got scared on this as I've also recently installed software from them, but I've been doing this since I was in college as I can't afford those software. Are you sure that you've downloaded from the right website? As there are a lot of fake websites that are cloning getintopc, they are exactly the same but the domain is different. I mostly found this in Google results. But to be safe, don't use any cracked software. I would do a clean install again tomorrow, try to transfer my funds, and also change the passwords on my accounts.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Feeling sad for you. Well can you please share some txid of the transactions done by scammer/hacker. Because few weeks back some irregular activities happened with me also. I also shared the whole story with proofs. Well, you should change your mails and wallets also.  I was also using some apps from that website before but now i shifted but not confirm either i am compromised till now or not

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMWebsite: https://getintopc.com/Amount Hacked: 1k$Type of Hacking: keyboard, Wallet access, Gmail, twitter and all other data accessI checked their reputation through Google and there are some reviews that do not recommend getintopc to download free software because of the many risks on their software but some based on users' reviews have been using it for many years with no issues at all, this platform is a use at your risk its unfortunate that the software you downloaded has a malware attached to it.They also have a clone site I don't know if they also own this websitehttps://getintopc.app/ they are very much the same in looks, design, and software listed

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: OP, could you please tell us which software you had downloaded from the site. It could be easy to carry out a forensic study to determine if the file is malware. Regardless, Free crack premium are the easiest way to spread malwareQuote from: robelneo on February 27, 2023, 09:24:24 AMI'm surprised to see that Virustotal gave it 100% clean results https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/5ef5c8a52f9c934ee1f6a76ce9e97b1208cc350efeb5bbaa50b32d841165fc01Because the domain itself does not have malware, but apps downloaded from the site could most definitely contain viruses

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Sorry to say but I didn't find any such situation from the getintopc software applications. Even though I am using Windows 10 and Windows 8 for a long time and every time whatever-related software I need to download which is paid or even free I prefer downloading it from this website and everything is still ok..Yes I know Pirated Software can't be trusted and patches are very harmful to sensitive data and you should never use pirated software in a personal PC but the dude still there are many applications that I can't afford to buy every time because I need one or twice a month so why should I pay for such application as I can't afford them. I better do one thing never place my sensitive data on my personal computer even with all paid software as well sometimes some pop-ups lead us into a major hack as we always stay connected to the internet and its not safe at all of the places such important documents with the Hot body (Internet connected devices). We are always at risk because sometimes unintentionally a small mistake leads to a major hack.So advised way is to note down your phrases on paper or notebook and keep them in hard form in actual secure means. I feel sad for your loss but it seems that the problem is on your end not on the website end I am not sure how is it possible because getintopc is one of the most trusted web 2.0 file downloading sites, but still there is an exception for it.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMWebsite: https://getintopc.com/Amount Hacked: 1k$Type of Hacking: keyboard, Wallet access, Gmail, twitter and all other data accessToday i am sharing my personal experience from one of the biggest scam site which offer free Software Crack and registration key. If you need any kind of paid software for free then you will find this only in Getintopc. All other websites appears in google search will not give you real key or crack. you will download files more than 300 mb and it will give error but Gentintopc provide 100% real software. This is the biggest reason when you search any free Software, you will find Getintopc on the topIf you install these softwares and cracked, it will change your registry and at first your keyboard will be hacked. whenever you make any transactions, it will show same address that you input but you will realize it change from original one when Metamask approved prompt appear Its not end here but these softwares contain malicious virus which will completely reveal your data to hacker. Hacker will have full access to your Gmails, telegram, twitter etc. in short your full system will be hacked. I would blame you first and then we can talk about the scammer site getintopc. First of all, why did you use the same computer to put all of your wallets and other software in the same machine ? You should have a separate system for your wallets (if you do not have hardware wallet).Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMi have saved all phrases in my personal Gmail This is an even bigger biggger mistake on your part. We should never store our private key phrases online. Many people store keys phrases on gmail or on cloud based services thinking they are secure. Think for a moment that these cloud based services are centralized and someone from the cloud storage provide team can see any file store on these servers.Keep your phrases offline and never store them online.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: xSkylarx on February 27, 2023, 05:12:10 PMI've got scared on this as I've also recently installed software from them, but I've been doing this since I was in college as I can't afford those software. Are you sure that you've downloaded from the right website? As there are a lot of fake websites that are cloning getintopc, they are exactly the same but the domain is different. I mostly found this in Google results. But to be safe, don't use any cracked software. I would do a clean install again tomorrow, try to transfer my funds, and also change the passwords on my accounts.yes i know there are so many clone Websites which has shit ads and nd also yhe files they provided are always corrupted. i double checked this website and i am using for 2 year. you should not keep your fund in system you have installed software from Getintopc. one of my friend which is experts in these says that hacker was keeping an eye on your all activities  for three months and then he did his job in one minute .Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on February 27, 2023, 08:57:12 PMOP, could you please tell us which software you had downloaded from the site. It could be easy to carry out a forensic study to determine if the file is malware. Regardless, Free crack premium are the easiest way to spread malwarei have download these software from Getintopc and also used crack:1: Filmora 2: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2022 Free Download These two are used when first hacked happen. 3: Adobe Premiere proQuote from: Hamza2424 on February 27, 2023, 09:22:13 PMI feel sad for your loss but it seems that the problem is on your end not on the website end I am not sure how is it possible because getintopc is one of the most trusted web 2.0 file downloading sites, but still there is an exception for it.I already mentioned that its not just happened with me but my three friends,3 cousins and some bounty hunters was hacked because of this. All has same kind of hacking and all used Getintopc free softwares. maybe you downloaded software before 2021 but i made this thread after i fully realized that its all happened because of Getintopc.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 10:46:47 AMQuote from: Potato Chips on February 27, 2023, 08:04:44 AMor just stay away from anything craked/pirated... Some free lancers or other users needed want these softwares for free and doesn't want to pay 100$ yearly for full version. Without key you cannot get full access to required software. for example in the free screen recorder watermark will not removed. Most of the free lancers and some bounty hunters also using these free screen recorder.It all boils down on which is more important for them: saving a few hundred bucks or whatever that goes on their PC? Yes, I guess there will be reputable sources for cracked software but you’ll never know when will money be tight for them so… essentially, it's a gamble. A good middle ground approach is to compartmentalize - don’t mix the important stuff with the high risks.Quote from: Hamza2424 on February 27, 2023, 09:22:13 PMSorry to say but I didn't find any such situation from the getintopc software applications. Even though I am using Windows 10 and Windows 8 for a long time and every time whatever-related software I need to download which is paid or even free I prefer downloading it from this website and everything is still ok..Selective scamming could've happened where some bad apples are mixed in.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMWebsite: https://getintopc.com/Amount Hacked: 1k$Type of Hacking: keyboard, Wallet access, Gmail, twitter and all other data accessToday i am sharing my personal experience from one of the biggest scam site which offer free Software Crack and registration key. If you need any kind of paid software for free then you will find this only in Getintopc. All other websites appears in google search will not give you real key or crack. you will download files more than 300 mb and it will give error but Gentintopc provide 100% real software. This is the biggest reason when you search any free Software, you will find Getintopc on the topIf you install these softwares and cracked, it will change your registry and at first your keyboard will be hacked. whenever you make any transactions, it will show same address that you input but you will realize it change from original one when Metamask approved prompt appear Its not end here but these softwares contain malicious virus which will completely reveal your data to hacker. Hacker will have full access to your Gmails, telegram, twitter etc. in short your full system will be hacked. How are you sure that it is the GetIntoPC site responsible for your hack as you said that the software downloaded from these sites has malware and viruses which hack your system.Don't you have an anti-virus or anti-malware system installed on your system and this software did not detect the suspicious software on your system ?Anyways, i read their reviews at trustpolit and find other people complaining the same issues  https://www.trustpilot.com/review/getintopc.com

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: And am guilty for using this site for the longest time when it comes to using free software, and of course crypto transactions are never done on this system that has unofficial stuff. Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM If you install these softwares and cracked, it will change your registry and at first your keyboard will be hacked. whenever you make any transactions, it will show same address that you input but you will realize it change from original one when Metamask approved prompt appear Have you tried to use malwarebytes to scan and clean your PC, from my experience this little software usually gets the job done, including the free version !Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM How i discover it?unfortunately i have been hacked two times and lost 1k$. i used this website for free screen recording and video editing software like premier pro. one day suddenly All Ethereum,bnb has been sent from all my Wallets to unknown address at one time. I think use bot to send only these main tokens. i lost 400$ first time but fortunately my 2500$ token remain safe and i withdrawn immediately after i realize.Is it possible that you clipboard was hijacked in one of the transactions you were performing , and do you leave you gadgets constantly connected to the internet, because is the only way this bot got active during its idle time ?? Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AM The purpose of telling here was that all people should be aware of it and no one should download any software from it. If you  need to download any software, then you should choose such a laptop for that which is extra and have no personal data, account information. Thanks for the advice, guess it's time to call it quits.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: AnonBitCoiner on February 27, 2023, 05:17:49 AMWebsite: https://getintopc.com/Amount Hacked: 1k$Type of Hacking: keyboard, Wallet access, Gmail, twitter and all other data accessIf you install these softwares and cracked, it will change your registry and at first your keyboard will be hacked. whenever you make any transactions, it will show same address that you input but you will realize it change from original one when Metamask approved prompt appear To be honest, I have not used Getintopc before. Still, I am almost certain that most of the sites that offer cracks and keys to break the protection of the program illegally are scam sites that offer cracks that contain malware. The mistake that you did that you installed these programs and cracks from Getintopc on your main computer connected to the Internet, which includes your accounts, wallets, information, etc., I am sorry for your loss, but now you have learned the lesson. Once again, you do not download any programs from any site except their official websites and do not download cracks. You can use the trial period for the program or buy it. Otherwise, you are exposing your device to be hacked by scammers. I also advise you not to save your recovery phrases for wallets on Gmail or any other mail, Telegram, Twitter..etc. Because if the hacker accesses your account, he will be able to use these phrases to steal your wallet but keep the recovery phrases in a note or paper away from anything.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on February 27, 2023, 08:57:12 PMOP, could you please tell us which software you had downloaded from the site. It could be easy to carry out a forensic study to determine if the file is malware. Regardless, Free crack premium are the easiest way to spread malwareQuote from: robelneo on February 27, 2023, 09:24:24 AMI'm surprised to see that Virustotal gave it 100% clean results https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/5ef5c8a52f9c934ee1f6a76ce9e97b1208cc350efeb5bbaa50b32d841165fc01Because the domain itself does not have malware, but apps downloaded from the site could most definitely contain virusesWhat I mean to say is Virustotal gave it 100% clean results because there are no reports of the site being a malware distributor, not exactly the domain but the contents of the site based on their partners' findings.https://support.virustotal.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002719069-ReportsQuote1) A list of each reviewing partner and their findings. Possible findings include:Clean site: no malware detected.Unrated site: the partner never reviewed the given site.Malware site: distributes malware.Phishing site: the site tries to steal users' credentials.Malicious site: the site contains exploits or other malicious artifacts.Suspicious site: the partner thinks this site is suspicious. Grey area.Spam site: involved in unsolicited email, popups, automatic commenting, etc.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on February 28, 2023, 02:56:41 PMAnyways, i read their reviews at trustpolit and find other people complaining the same issues  https://www.trustpilot.com/review/getintopc.comThis Trustpilot review  strengthened my point. everybody can clearly read the reviews of people that are being hacked and lost their fund and many personal information. I don't want that anybody here also become target of this and i done my job i am now full protected because i am using Hardware wallet and phrase only stored in hard copy. Many careless people still using these software in personal laptop which is high unsecured.Here are some Reviews  which are worthy of attentionQuote Don't use this site , it's full of bad viruses that can ruin your personal information .Always remember , nothing is for free , if you find something free on the internet , make sure you are the product.Date of experience: December 24, 2022 QuoteI have downloaded a file from this site named: Coolutils Total Image Converter 2022 with crack/activator. I have used the activator and nothing happened. The program worked just fine, I could convert images without a watermark or anything. But recently when I have copy-pasted my Binance BTC address to receive payment from a friend, I found the money was not reached to my Binance account. Then I talked with Binance support and they told me about this Copy-Paste ransomware/malware that changes the copied BTC address tho their's BTC address silently. If you do not check and reconfirm your BTC address then the sender will send the money to the creator of this ransomware. So always check and re-check and confirm your Crypto address when you send it to someone. I have lost 250$.Date of experience: May 24, 2022 Quotegot my amazon acount hacked they bought multiple prepaid cards as playstation ones, and im sure its from theyr download they silently inject malware but the program is working fine, dont use these software on your personnal pc, just on a second pc that isnt connected to any google acount or anything else , they inject something that will give em all access to your acounts and keyboard typing (password etc) and they added facebook adds on my acount too and google ads tooDate of experience: November 17, 2022

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: All I know is if you're getting something for free there's a risk attached to it, there's no free lunch on the internet when it comes to software, and hackers and scammers are good at bundling their malware, some users are safe on using software coming from this platform because the hackers traced that there are no important data or Cryptocurrency that the users have in his PC, but if you are a Crypto investor they will hack your account, so if you're an investor, and interested to use their software use a different computer or better take the best alternative and that is buying the original
